DOC.brief_summary: This pilot clinical trial study Harvesting Health Program improve diet physical activity level cancer survivor . Nutrition physical activity class opportunity harvest fruit , vegetable , herb may increase participant ' fruit vegetable consumption physical activity level . Studying participation rate change participant ' eat physical activity habit may help doctor learn whether program effect participant lifestyle .
DOC.brief_title: Harvesting Health Program Improving Diet Physical Activity Level Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . Measure survivor participation regard aspect Harvesting Health Program ( personalize group education , garden harvesting , utilization novel web-based technology ) . II . Assess survivor preference regard key Harvesting Health Program component impact participation ( physical facility , schedule timing , education topic session , garden access , web portal usability , etc. ) . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . A customized `` Nutrition & Physical Activity Scorecard '' develop implement evaluate pre/post measure diet physical activity baseline ( month 0 ) month 6 , 9 12 . II . Participants evaluate baseline completion intervention : ( ) serum body composition biomarkers exposure efficacy , ( b ) health index related cancer survivorship overall health . III . To assess Program sustainability , follow-up questionnaire complete 9 12 month use Nutrition & Physical Activity Scorecard questionnaires regard quality life outcome . OUTLINE : Participants undergo series 10 education training session 1 hour every 2 week , comprise education current research , evidence-based health guideline , application technique , reference material specific extended-stage cancer survivor , recommendation personal health goal survivorship .
DOC.criteria: Voluntary agreement participate sign inform consent document Adults ability read , write , speak English access internet Cancer survivor complete active cancer treatment within previous 12 month extendedstage survivor ) Survivors must computer internet access active email account Participants must refrain travel 3 week total intervention period Participants undergoing longterm hormone therapy ( i.e. , tamoxifen ) permit enroll Cancer survivor cognitively unable consent physical mental limitation would prevent full participation program Adults receive active treatment include surgery , neoadjuvant hormonal , chemotherapy , radiation Survivors preexist medical condition preclude unsupervised physical activity ( i.e. , severe orthopedic condition , impend hip knee replacement , paralysis , unstable angina , dementia , recent history myocardial infarction , congestive heart failure , pulmonary condition require oxygen , hospitalization within six month ) Adults take medication allow increase intake fruit vegetable ( i.e. , pharmacologic dos warfarin ) Survivors currently involve clinical trial Longterm cancer survivor ( > 12 month post treatment ) Those plan start certain medication trial enrollment use non prescription substance ( i.e . saw palmetto herbal alternative product ) Survivors active metabolic digestive illness malabsorptive disorder ( Crohn 's , celiac disease , irritable bowel syndrome [ IBS ] ) , renal insufficiency , hepatic insufficiency , cachexia , short bowel syndrome Pregnant woman exclude study
